PrintPDFTest=function PrintPDFTest(_ref){var singlebatchpayslip=_ref.singlebatchpayslip;var period=singlebatchpayslip[0].period;var subtitle="Payroll Summary for the period  ".concat(period);var items=singlebatchpayslip.map(function(r){return{name:r.name,wages:r.wages_bnd};});var names=singlebatchpayslip.map(function(r){return r.name;});var wages=singlebatchpayslip.map(function(r){var scpamount=singlebatchpayslip.map(function(r){var amount=formatPriceZero(r.scp_amount_bnd);return amount;});var sitesallowsamt=singlebatchpayslip.map(function(r){var allowsamt=singlebatchpayslip.map(function(r){var amount=formatPriceZero(r.total_allowances_bnd);return amount;});var deductsamt=singlebatchpayslip.map(function(r){var amount=formatPriceZero(r.total_deductions_bnd);return amount;});var nettpay=singlebatchpayslip.map(function(r){var amount=formatPriceZero(r.nett_pay_bnd);return amount;});var totalwages=singlebatchpayslip.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+item.wages_bnd;},0);var totaltap=singlebatchpayslip.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+item.tap_amount_bnd;},0);var totalscp=singlebatchpayslip.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+item.scp_amount_bnd;},0);var totalsitesallows=singlebatchpayslip.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+item.site_allows_bnd;},0);var totalexpclaims=singlebatchpayslip.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+item.expenses_claims_bnd;},0);var totalallows=singlebatchpayslip.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+item.total_allowances_bnd;},0);var totaldeducts=singlebatchpayslip.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+item.total_deductions_bnd;},0);var totalnettpay=singlebatchpayslip.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+item.nett_pay_bnd;},0);var vfs=vfsFonts.pdfMake.vfs;pdfMake.vfs=vfs;var documentDefinition={pageSize:"A4",pageOrientation:"landscape",content:[{text:"AppSmith Sutera Sdn alignment: 'justify'
}};pdfMake.createPdf(documentDefinition).open();};export default PrintPDFTest;
